text:
<@U03C4RC8X> we put together a google for to gauge interest in a virtual vim conference and to create a program structure for the event itself. would be happy if you could send this out to all of the people in your community you think would be interested in this!

<https://forms.gle/ssJ6X69rPcf6CDBr9>

also if you would be, or anyone you know would be interested in supporting the conference and volunteering to support and join the small team to make it happen that would be amazing!

attachments.title: VimConfVirtual - 2020
attachments.text: As vim lovers we're always looking to learn more and share our passion for this amazing program with fellow vimmers. In today's global isolation, conferences of any kind have all but shuttered, including many annual vim events. We would like to bring all vim lovers globally together for a one of a kind virtual vim conference that will be pure magic and awesome! If intrigued, please fill out this form so we can gauge interest in such an event and move another step forward to making it happen!
